description: This file sets up an agent with specific tools and model configuration, then runs an asynchronous response printing method.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response from the agent based on a prompt.
